title: Cry Baby
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I went out and bought everythin' you like, yeah
Everythin' you like, yeah
Everythin' you like
And I gave it to someone that I don't even like, yeah
I don't even like, yeah
Bought your favourite car in your favourite colour
You were supposed to drive, but I gave it to another
[Pre-Chorus]
'Cause I gave my all to you, I gave my all to you
I gave my all, my all
But I, but I, but I, but I, I
[Chorus]
I guess you never fell in love with my love
Nah, nah, baby
Guess this will teach you nevеr cry wolf
Cry, cry baby
I guess that this will teach you
I guess that this will tеach you
I guess that this will teach you
I guess that this will teach you
Cry, cry baby
[Verse 2]
I know that you think I do this out of spite, yeah
Do this out of spite, yeah
Do this out of spite
I could say you're wrong, but you just might be right, yeah
You just might be right, yeah
Now I'm walkin' past all our favourite places
We talk about our latest, 'cause people come in phases

[Pre-Chorus]
Yeah I gave my all to you, I gave my all to you
I gave my all, my all
But I, but I, but I, but I, I
[Chorus]
I guess you never fell in love with my love
Nah, nah, baby
Guess this will teach you never cry wolf
Cry, cry baby
I guess that this will teach you
I guess that this will teach you
I guess that this will teach you
I guess that this will teach you
Cry, cry baby
